attributes.action: amend section 11 of the Landlord and Tenant act, so that the Landlord is responsible for ensuring the depth of loft insulation meets government's guidelines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Section 11 of the Landlord and Tenant Act states the landlord is responsible for: -

repairs to the structure and exterior of the property, heating and hot water installations, basins, sinks, baths and other sanitary installations.

Unfortunately, this doesn't clarify if the landlord is responsible for loft insulation. We would like the Prime Minister to amend the act, to show that loft insulation is included and therefore the responsibility of the Landlord to install and keep up to standard.
